solution_line_template: If he worked on a song for {hours_per_day_per_song} hours a day, the total number of hours he takes to complete one song is {hours_per_day_per_song}*{days_per_song} = <<{hours_per_day_per_song}*{days_per_song}={hours_per_song}>>{hours_per_song} hours.

If one song took {hours_per_song} hours to complete, the total number of hours the three songs took to be completed is {num_songs}*{hours_per_song} = <<{num_songs}*{hours_per_song}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours
